description.value:
A spellstriker gauntlet is wrought iron with gleaming arcane sigils etched into its surface.

Activate F envision

Frequency once per hour

Trigger You use Spellstrike with a non-cantrip spell and miss with the Strike

Effect An explosion of magical energy—stored up for the Spellstrike—explodes out. All creatures in a @Template[emanation|distance:5] take 1d4 damage per rank of the spell, with a @Check[reflex|against:spell|basic] save against your spell DC. This damage is the same type the spell would have dealt, and the activation gains that trait; if the spell would have dealt multiple types of damage, choose one of them. If the damage of the explosion is mental, the save is @Check[will|against:spell|basic] instead of Reflex.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.6DfLZBl8wKIV03Iq]{Ignition}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Gb7SeieEvd0pL2Eh]{Sure Strike}

Craft Requirements You have the magus's Spellstrike activity. Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
